description: This module provides you with the foundational application of analytics in the internal and external auditing process. Students will have an opportunity to gain technological and managerial overview of analytical techniques in the auditing domain, link audit analytics to an organisationâ€™s continuous monitoring, business process support, and audit analytics reporting.
title: Audit Analytics
prerequisite: The student has completed at least 56MCs (i.e., 14 modules)
